properties.entry: SELECT NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, NATION_CONTENT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, NATION_CONTENT FROM (SELECT NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, NATION_CONTENT FROM TB_NATION WHERE NOT TB_NATION.NATION_NO = 82 ORDER BY NATION_NO) A ) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_NATION WHERE NOT TB_NATION.NATION_NO = 82
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_CITY

SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, COUNT FROM (SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, TB_CITY.NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, COUNT FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON(TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE NOT TB_NATION.NATION_NO = 82 ORDER BY COUNT DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 8

SELECT TB_NATION.NATION_NO NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, NATION_CONTENT, VISA_NAME FROM TB_NATION JOIN BRTB_VISA ON (TB_NATION.NATION_NO = BRTB_VISA.NATION_NO) JOIN TB_VISA ON (BRTB_VISA.VISA_NO = TB_VISA.VISA_NO) WHERE TB_NATION.NATION_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_CITY SET COUNT = COUNT + 1 WHERE NATION_NO = ? AND CITY_NAME = ?
SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, CITY_CONTENT FROM TB_CITY WHERE NATION_NO = ?

SELECT CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, CITY_CONTENT, NATION_NAME, FLYING_TIME, VISA_NAME FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON(TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) JOIN BRTB_VISA ON (BRTB_VISA.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) JOIN TB_VISA ON (BRTB_VISA.VISA_NO = TB_VISA.VISA_NO) WHERE CITY_NAME = ?
SELECT LANGUAGE_NAME FROM TB_LANGUAGE JOIN BRTB_LANG ON (TB_LANGUAGE.LANGUAGE_NO = BRTB_LANG.LANGUAGE_NO) JOIN TB_NATION ON (BRTB_LANG.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE TB_NATION.NATION_NO = ?
SELECT VOL_NAME FROM TB_VOLTAGE JOIN BRTB_VOL ON (TB_VOLTAGE.VOL_NO = BRTB_VOL.VOL_NO) JOIN TB_NATION ON (BRTB_VOL.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE TB_NATION.NATION_NO = ?

SELECT CURRENCY_NAME FROM TB_CURRENCY JOIN BRTB_CURRENCY ON (BRTB_CURRENCY.CURRENCY_NO = TB_CURRENCY.CURRENCY_NO) JOIN TB_NATION ON (BRTB_CURRENCY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) WHERE TB_NATION.NATION_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) COUNT FROM TB_STORY WHERE STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT STORY_NO, STORY_TITLE, CREATE_DATE FROM (SELECT S.STORY_NO STORY_NO, S.STORY_TITLE STORY_TITLE, S.CREATE_DATE CREATE_DATE, ROWNUM RNUM FROM (SELECT STORY_NO, STORY_TITLE, TO_CHAR(STORY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') CREATE_DATE FROM TB_STORY WHERE STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY STORY_NO DESC) S) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT STORY_NO, STORY_TITLE, STORY_CN, TO_CHAR(STORY_DATE, 'YYYY/MM/DD') STORY_DATE, STORY_FROM FROM TB_STORY WHERE STORY_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, COUNT FROM (SELECT ROWNUM, NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, COUNT FROM (SELECT TB_CITY.NATION_NO NATION_NO, NATION_NAME, CITY_NO, CITY_NAME, COUNT FROM TB_CITY JOIN TB_NATION ON (TB_CITY.NATION_NO = TB_NATION.NATION_NO) ORDER BY TB_NATION.NATION_NO ASC)) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
UPDATE TB_NATION SET NATION_NAME = ?, NATION_CONTENT = ? WHERE NATION_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_TYPE, FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 9 AND BOARD_NO = ?
SELECT BOARD_TYPE, FILE_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME FROM TB_FILE WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND BOARD_NO = ?
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, 9 );
INSERT INTO TB_FILE ( FILE_NO, BOARD_NO, FILE_PATH, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, BOARD_TYPE ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE.NEXTVAL, ?, ?, ?, ?, 1 );
UPDATE TB_FILE SET FILE_PATH = ?, ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 9 AND BOARD_NO = ?
UPDATE TB_FILE SET FILE_PATH = ?, ORIGIN_NAME = ?, CHANGE_NAME = ? WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND BOARD_NO = ?
